name: Spinach Mayonnaise
recipeIngredient: 1/4 pound spinach, tough stems and blemished leaves removed

recipeInstructions.text: Drop spinach into boiling water to cover with salt. Let cook about 1 minute and drain. Run under cold running water and press to extract excess liquid.
Chop spinach as finely as possible or process it in a food processor or electric blender. Blend with mayonnaise. Add lemon juice.
